data.name: Ночная тема для BlastHack
data.description: Стиль делает темную тему форума более тусклой и приятной для глаза. Все цвета подобраны очень хорошо и не отбивают желание пользоваться темой.

data.name: HackMD Night Theme
Compact JIRA Board H6A
data.description: Custom Style for JIRA's Active Sprint Board

data.name: Fallen London Opportunity Protector
data.description:
Removes the "Discard"-button for certain cards (both in browser- and mobile-mode), so you cannot discard them by accident.
Removes the "Go"-button for certain options, so you cannot play them by accident.

This is the updated script for the Fallen London Redesign, based on the old styles by fallingkitten and gazzien.

data.description: This Extension turns the knights on Lichess to Yeastkens

data.name: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns v.24
data.description:
Firefox and Chrome tested.
Less scrolling with a multi columns interface.....

<mark>Auto-load more Results work now ! </mark>

<mark>▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)</mark>

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

data.name: Gmail — Hide add-ons sidebar buttons
data.description: Hides the buttons on the right that open add-ons in the side bar. The buttons will be condensed into a single button, and will expand on hover.
